name: Designova
overview:
Designova (also known as Designova Webtech Network) is an innovative online network formed by a group of creative web designers & developers across the globe, commited to build a better stuffs on web.

Designova Webtech Network (also known as Designova Network) provides premium services on Web Designing, Web Development, Web Templates and Wordpress Theme Design and Customization, Branding Identity, Logo and 3D Designing services as well as Web Hosting solutions.

The official website of Designova Webtech Network is http://www.designova.net and the organization website is http://www.designova.org.

Designova Webtech Network features many websites and web services such as: DoneHost Web Hosting Services (http://www.donehost.com), PixelGlimpse Tech Blog (http://www.pixelglimpse.com), CreativeRays 3D Solutions (http://www.creativerays.com) etc.

General Queris: info@designova.net Business Inquiries: admin@designova.net
